text: 2.4: Mk 16.20; FG 2.22; 14.3; 1 Ko 2.4; 12.4; 12.7; 12.11; Ef 1.5; 1.9Fhe Bakɨme ana mbarkɨrga mirikori, ana nta mbuav vhɨra ŋaari bakɨvi ana nta mbuav won ŋkasŋka bakɨme ndi khɨvigi. Ana nta mbuav, ana vhɨra ana Ŋina Ŋaar won ŋaarar muun zav fhura ndɨɨi ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ gum ŋkasŋka ana wo vuzvugar, ana ntan gumgi gu mbigi mbari ga nɨɨŋgi. Ana mba tɨva muuŋgim, nza ne gangiap kaŋgi, ana Kama buni, nta guigi guarara buni guari ma.
